text.headline:
Vortex,
2005 - 2015
text.text: Vortex is a little story of success: today, 10 years after its foundation by two PhD in Atmospheric Physics and a self-taught IT expert, the company has offices in three continents and serves users from 149 countries.

media.caption: Pep Moreno installing a met. mast during a measurement campaign in Northern Spain. Early 90’s

text.headline: A young company made up of old experts
text.text: Vortex was born in Barcelona on September 19th 2005, but its team’s background is much older: the accumulated experience in the wind industry of its members goes back 25 years ago.

media.caption: David Saez at the first Vortex cluster in its datacenter. Late 2006

text.headline: A simple, powerfull idea
text.text: Alingned with pioner Cloud Computing approaches, the foundational idea of the Vortex service is simple: remote modeling, on-line. As we liked to say that time: "let's bring the power of a supercomputer to your fingerprints"

media.caption: Josep Calbó at the Universitat de Girona by 2006

text.headline: Support of the University
text.text: Thanks to Josep Calbó, Vortex co-founder and professor at the University of Girona, the later helped the company's growth by complementing its professional experience with academic know-how
